thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie
thread.title: Paul and Tricia
thread.title_full: Energia reviewed by Paul and Tricia

author: Paul and Tricia
title: Paul and Tricia
text: After many years with Electric Ireland we got a much better deal from Energia. We spoke to Energia Customer Care who were excellent and agreed that the deal we got on Switch.ie was the best around. Easy changeover with no hitches. Hopefully when the year contract is over, Energia will want to keep us and offer a good discount to stay.
